channel.title: Kim Jong Il Dead
channel.description:
Just announced
Discuss.
Also heard something about them declaring war on something
And I'm on the west coast..
shit.

item.title: Kim Jong Il Dead
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

I live in America and a typical day of mine … Wake up, eat, eat, do whatever I want, shit, eat, eat, sleep. No worries of living on the sidewalk or worry about not having enough food… because if it gets to that point I can go to the nearest DES and get some food stamps and a home. Yes we may be in debt but its natural cycles of the economy… it will go up and down. For every positive reaction we have a negative… right now we are in the negative but does it matter? No.

Just to add on to that, what matters is the leadership of our county and their decisions.

Read full topic

item.title: Kim Jong Il Dead
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:132, topic:425891”]We’re almost 15 Trillion dollars in debt. 1 in 2 Americans are poor or have low income.
Yes, “that horrible”.[/quote]
Not as horrible as the Koreans have it, i live in America and I’ve seen what they live like compared to us. Just because Hussein decides to take over our economy with his lies doesn’t mean we’re as bad as a third world country. It’s just selfish to think that way. Here poor in those polls would be anyone making a few hundred under middle-class. Poor would be the lazy who don’t want to work, the poor would be those who thanks to nationalized healthcare, don’t have any choice in where to get treatments therefore they’ll stay disabled, poor is the drug addict. But in Korea where the wealth is shared, that’s incredibly worse than what we live in right now, and I’m considered poor in those polls yet I can eat anything at any time i want to. The genuinely poor here are outnumbered by the idiots. I’m not saying anything against you i whole heartedly agree with you. The Koreans just have it worse.

Read full topic

RIP Kim Jong Il, great leader who had the fucking balls to stand against entire jewish control the world and kick the fucking kikes out of north korea.

Don’t come onto here and spew your religionism you athiest cunt

Being against abrahamic religions doesn’t make me atheist, cunt.

Considering i’ve already seen you belittle two different religions, it was a fair assumption to say that you are an athiest, cunt.
[/quote]

They do not cease to exist. Christians are not superior, Jewish people are non superior, neither are atheists.

item.description:
@SETO wrote:

[quote=“Godandjesus, post:119, topic:425891”][quote author=neroxx link=topic=528573.msg3857734#msg3857734 date=1324469168]
Kim Jong Il was a dictator, like Muammar al-Gaddafi … he got everyone to think that it was he who was the god. No one was allowed to do anything other than what he said. Kim Jong Il, did not allow residents to use their mobile phones or television, or no internet. He was power-mad. thats what i mean xD
[/quote]

They have mobile phones, television and internet, though internet is pretty limited. They also have stable economy. The fiction that people in North Korea are starving and unhappy is based on western world propaganda, its not true.[/quote]

you mean an economy with 0% growth, and piggy packing on china
